message: Let's divide fairly, I get a bit more
Let's split things a bit more evenly this time. My turn to get a slightly better share.
You had your chance, now it's my turn again. Still willing to share fairly
Okay, let's stop wasting time.  A 50/50 split is fair and we both lose if we drag this out.
You're getting desperate, I can see. Still not good enough for me

I'm not budging. You're the one losing value, not me
